title: Earclip, ca. 1965
signed: Earclips have plastic ear cushion and are marked on the reverse of the stem: France, and on the reverse of the central vein: Lalique. Brooch is marked on the reverse of the stem: Lalique.  Attached to each piece by a green cord is a circular stamped lead seal: M.C./a star/Lalique/France.
dimensions:
H x W x D (brooch): 6.5 x 4.5 x 0.4 cm (2 9/16 x 1 3/4 x 3/16 in.)
H x W x D (earrings): 4.4 x 3.3 x 0.7 cm (1 3/4 x 1 5/16 x 1/4 in.)
description: Each earclip and the brooch are in the form of an oak leaf with a gold stem and veining, filled with deep green and dark red plique-à-jour enamel.  Earclips have plastic ear cushion and are marked on the reverse of the stem: France, and on the reverse of the central vein: Lalique. Brooch is marked on the reverse of the stem: Lalique.  Attached to each piece by a green cord is a circular stamped lead seal: M.C./a star/Lalique/France.

tombstone.epitaph:
Earclip, ca. 1965.
ca. 1965. Gold, plique-à-jour enamel, plastic. Gift of Jacques Jugeat. 1969-143-2-a/c.
